sceneDescription.title: First Meeting with Long John Silver

setting.location: The Spy-glass Tavern, Bristol docks, England

characters.appearance: Tall man, 40s, missing left leg, cheerful round face
characters.clothing: Clean blue coat, white shirt, leather apron
Traveling clothes, brown jacket, cap in hand
characters.action: Looking up at tall man with mixture of awe and uncertainty

characters.appearance: Colorful parrot, green with red patches

scene.mainElements: Bustling dockside tavern interior with one-legged tavern keeper charming young visitor, parrot adding exotic touch
scene.details: Rough wooden bar polished smooth, barrels and bottles behind counter, sawdust on floor, nautical charts on walls, morning light filtering through grimy windows, dock workers at tables in background, ship masts visible through windows
scene.background: Bristol harbor activity visible outside, sailors and merchants passing by windows
scene.atmosphere: Deceptively welcoming, busy maritime commerce, underlying tension beneath Silver's charm

composition.cameraAngle: Low angle emphasizing Silver's imposing height
composition.focus: Silver's friendly face contrasting with his powerful presence
composition.depth: Silver and parrot commanding foreground, boy in middle ground looking up, tavern activity in soft focus background
